item.title: About
item.description: Me Akshay Malik. Architect and city planner by education. Currently working as a transportation analyst for the City of Philadelphia. Over the past 8 years - I have designed and built large buildings, planned government infrastructure, written public policy, studied traffic safety issues and written code for web mapping applications. I am truely grateful for the love and support from my family. I thank all the people who I learned from, worked with or simply met along the way.
